pageContext.claim: “Much of the bad blood with Russia is caused by the Fake & Corrupt Russia Investigation, headed up by the all Democrat loyalists, or people that worked for Obama. Mueller is most conflicted of all (except Rosenstein who signed FISA & Comey letter). No Collusion, so they go crazy!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump ignores the fact that the top officials involved in the investigation, such as special prosecutor Robert Mueller and Deputy Attorney General Rod Rosenstein are long-time Republicans. Nine members of Mueller’s team have made political donations to Democrats, compared to seven with no record of such donations. Five of the 16 known members contributed to Hillary Clinton’s 2016 campaign. In any case, the DOJ is legally barred from discriminating career appointees based on political affiliation.
